1_1MCsyW6W243LY69ZYm99XbV3M8Gbbrp5hF.body: is anyone using peertube?  For anyone that isn't familiar it's a decentralized youtube alternative that also connects to the fediverse.  Right now it needs content though, I'd love to see more Linux videos there.  You can of course self-host as well.  https://joinpeertube.org/en/
